content: When using a Macbook using an apple silicon / M1 CPU, docker-compose up -d --build fails.
I've created an issue about what we've tried here: https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter/issues/313
Basically, the first error we're getting is: no matching manifest for linux/arm64/v8 in the manifest list entries

And after making some changes to our docker-compose.yml (described in the issue), we're now getting: failed to solve: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = failed to solve with frontend dockerfile.v0: failed to create LLB definition: docker.io/hapiproject/hapi:base: not found
